Content.Head: Freelance
Content.Description: As a freelance developer, I work along side teams of all sizes. I have learned to use many different project management tools and methods. My primary responsibilities at the agencies were testing utilities, react component development, and debugging code.

Content.Head: Carbon
Content.Description: Carbon is a web development agency tailored towards small business clients, and sub contracting under other agencies. Apart of the team I developed their library of testing utilities; as well as, implemented agile project management into their workflow.

Content.Head: Denver IT Consultants
Content.Description: Field IT Consultant solving network, and system issues. Communicated with the client about the issue, diagnosed, and solved issues on site. Developed a ticket system to allow clients, techs, and management to monitor and communicate over issues.

MyWorkContent.Title: Jones Bodywork
MyWorkContent.SubTitle: January 2020 - Front End
MyWorkContent.Description: Jeff Jones was a referral client looking to translate his minimalist nature and his general compassion to his clients. Jones Bodywork is a custom development project, utilizing a clean and lightweight static build.

MyWorkContent.Title: DP Waterer
MyWorkContent.SubTitle: December 2019 - Front End / Back End
MyWorkContent.Description: A Watering Post company, that I worked on under a larger firm. I was personally responsible for the various calculators, and shop logic through out the site. The site runs on Wordpress with a Woo-commerce store, and javascript calculators.

MyWorkContent.Title: BarnHouse Tap
MyWorkContent.SubTitle: December 2019 - Front End / Back End
MyWorkContent.Description: A local Englewood Bar with a wide array of ever changing beers, and spirits on tap. They wanted to be able to update their clients what was on tap at the moment. Built with a simple lightweight front end, and connected to a noSQL based backed for easy user manipulation of what was on tap.

MyWorkContent.Title: Posh Photography
MyWorkContent.SubTitle: November, 2019 - Front End
MyWorkContent.Description: A photography business, that specializes in landscape and portrait photography. They approached me with the idea to develop something simple and clean to showcase some of their best work.
